addr: 60 Washington Sqaure South. 10th Floor. New York, NY 10012
title: Immigration and New York City Schools
desc: On the 50th Anniversary of the Immigration Act of 1965, a result of the earlier Civil Rights Act, we invite you to a conference which will examine contemporary issues in immigration and education. Join Metro Center for a conference on immigrant youth and schools. Panelists will discuss the unique needs of immigrant youth, and how schools can and are responsive to their needs.
